H0.text: Which county in England has a flag consisting of a white cross on a black background. Cornwall

H1.text: Which county in England has a flag consisting of a white cross on a black background. Kent

H2.text: Which county in England has a flag consisting of a white cross on a black background. Devon

H3.text: Which county in England has a flag consisting of a white cross on a black background. Curnow

A4.text: Saint Piran's Flag is the national flag and ancient banner of Cornwall, and an emblem of the Cornish people.

A5.text: The banner of Saint Piran is a white cross on a black background (in terms of heraldry 'sable, a cross argent').
